医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人类布鲁氏菌病发病率的全面全球和区域分析全球和区域人类布鲁氏菌病发病率的循证估计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/A-compressive-global-and-regional-analysis-of- human-Brucellosis-incidence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/A-compressive-global-and-regional-analysis-of- human-Brucellosis-incidence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d329a94c-7e98-450b-a3c0-e601c4109086 Wed, 23 Aug 2023 06:07:00 -0400 A comprehensive global and regional analysis of human Brucellosis incidence
当前和未来针对侵袭性肺炎球菌疾病的疫苗接种策略研究人员回顾了现有侵袭性肺炎球菌疾病疫苗所采用的免疫机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Current-and-future-strategies-for-vaccinating-against-pressive-pneumococcal-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Current-and-future-strategies-for-vaccinating-against-pressive-pneumococcal-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b1ee342-b758-4b19-9bcd-fdafa31aec3c Wed, 23 Aug 2023 06:07:00 -0400 Current and future strategies for vaccinating against invasive pneumococcal disease
微生物诊断二代测序临床应用有哪些需求？科学家们进行了调查，以了解微生物实验室临床应用下一代测序的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/What-are-the-needs-for-clinical-application-of-next- Generation-sequencing-for-microbiological-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/What-are-the-needs-for-clinical-application-of-next- Generation-sequencing-for-microbiological-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b711046c-046e-45e9-a387-556c831f7e7e Wed, 23 Aug 2023 05:58:00 -0400 What are the needs for clinical application of next-generation sequencing for microbiological diagnosis?
综述探讨睡眠障碍与怀孕之间的关系最近的一篇评论总结了对这些条件的了解，并提出了未来的研究方向和机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Review-explores-relationship- Between-sleep-disorders-and-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Review-explores-relationship- Between-sleep-disorders-and-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7fcd7a4-2f3b-4df5-992b-501cb39be113 Wed, 23 Aug 2023 05:46:00 -0400 Review explores relationship between sleep disorders and pregnancy
中国成人膳食模式与全身性肥胖和向心性肥胖的关系该研究旨在评估饮食模式与肥胖的长期关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Association-of-dietary-patterns-with-general-and-central-obesity-in-Chinese-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Association-of-dietary-patterns-with-general-and-central-obesity-in-Chinese-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c946ee9-faa8-40ac-826f-2c8ec07ab47c Wed, 23 Aug 2023 03:57:00 -0400 Association of dietary patterns with general and central obesity in Chinese adults
新计算器可预测肝细胞癌患者早期复发的风险肝细胞癌（HCC）是最常见的肝癌，也是全球癌症相关死亡的第四大原因，其中中国占全球年度病例和死亡人数的一半以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/New-calculator-predicts-risk-of-early-recurrence-in-病人-with-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/New-calculator-predicts-risk-of-early-recurrence-in-病人-with-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d27760f-3871-4693-9d8c-432061d3a81c Wed, 23 Aug 2023 00:12:03 -0400 New calculator predicts risk of early recurrence in patients with hepatocellular carcinoma
大量接触 COVID-19 可能会克服疫苗接种和既往感染的保护作用耶鲁大学、佛罗里达大学和康涅狄格州惩教署的研究人员进行的一项新研究表明，大量接触导致 COVID-19 的病毒可能会减少或克服疫苗接种和先前感染所提供的保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/High-levels-of-COVID-19-exposure-can-overcome-protection-from-vaccination-and-prior-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/High-levels-of-COVID-19-exposure-can-overcome-protection-from-vaccination-and-prior-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=547727c5-d51f-4a38-a6d3-785f95622fad Tue, 22 Aug 2023 23:19:00 -0400 High levels of COVID-19 exposure can overcome protection from vaccination and prior infection
UT Health San Antonio 及其合作伙伴获得 NIH 资助，将科学发现转化为治疗效益德克萨斯大学圣安东尼奥健康科学中心（也称为 UT Health San Antonio）和 7 个地区合作者将在未来 5 到 7 年内利用美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的 4600 万美元资金，将科学发现转化为治疗效益人类健康和福祉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/UT-Health-San-Antonio-and-partners-secure-NIH-funding-to-translate-scientific-discoveries-into-therapeutic-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/UT-Health-San-Antonio-and-partners-secure-NIH-funding-to-translate-scientific-discoveries-into-therapeutic-benefits.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1dea13fd-bb3c-40c0-8357-17120dd41c4f Tue, 22 Aug 2023 23:14:00 -0400 UT Health San Antonio and partners secure NIH funding to translate scientific discoveries into therapeutic benefits
科学家找到了在与 Epstein-Barr 病毒相关的胃癌中“按下自毁按钮”的方法现在，威斯塔研究所的科学家发现了与 Epstein-Barr 病毒相关的胃癌的潜在靶点；研究结果发表在《mBio》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Scientists-find-way-to-press-self-destruct-button-in-gastric-cancer-associate-with-Epstein-Barr-Virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Scientists-find-way-to-press-self-destruct-button-in-gastric-cancer-linked-with-Epstein-Barr-Virus.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=429bc718-690b-436e-bb57-4acf3c940209 Tue, 22 Aug 2023 23:10:00 -0400 Scientists find way to 'press self-destruct button' in gastric cancer associated with Epstein-Barr Virus
阿司匹林在预防心脏病和中风方面未得到充分利用对于经历过心脏病或中风的人来说，每天服用阿司匹林已被证明有助于预防第二次心脏病发作或中风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Aspirin-underutilized-for-preventing-heart-attack-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Aspirin-underutilized-for-preventing-heart-attack-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21c5fa92-724c-4612-a381-ec3dee53b360 Tue, 22 Aug 2023 22:53:05 -0400 Aspirin underutilized for preventing heart attack, stroke
